heist.room

Class RoomStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • heist.room.Room
      • heist.room.RoomStatus

  • public class RoomStatus
extends Room
    Class to represent the room as the MasterThief perceives it. Stores how many paintings were retrieved from a room, if the room is cleared and if there is an AssaultParty currently attacking the room.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class heist.room.Room

        paintings

    • Constructor Summary

      RoomStatus constructor from id and distance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RoomStatus

        public RoomStatus(int id,
                  int distance)
        RoomStatus constructor from id and distance. Number of paintings always starts at 0.
        Parameters:
        id - Room id.
        distance - Room distance.

    • Method Detail

      • addThievesAttacking

        public void addThievesAttacking(int thievesAttacking)
        Set if there is a party assigned to this room. Indication the number of thieves attacking the room.
        Parameters:
        thievesAttacking - Number of thieves attacking the room.

      • getThievesAttacking

        public int getThievesAttacking()
        Get how many thieves are still attacking the room. This number is decreased when returning from the room with a canvas or empty handed.
        Returns:
        Number of thieves attacking the room.

      • underAttack

        public boolean underAttack()
        Check if there is a party attacking this room.
        Returns:
        True if there is a party assigned to this room.

      • isClear

        public boolean isClear()
        Check if the room is cleared out.
        Returns:
        True if the room is cleared out.

      • setClear

        public void setClear()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Mark the room as clear.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws exception if thievesAttacking value goes bellow zero.

      • deliverPainting

        public void deliverPainting()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Deliver painting to this room. Adds a new painting to the room and reduces the number of thieves attacking the room value.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws exception if thievesAttacking value goes bellow zero.
